text: Today is Halloween

The coolest thing about it 
is that you can be anything you wanna be

Hey, I’ve got a plan…
Let’s dress up like a Halloween band!
A band?
A Halloween band!
I’ll be a witch…and I’ll play broom guitar
I’ll play the bass [vampire laugh]
I’ll be a superstar
Superman laying down a super, duper beat
And I’ll play the keyboard…what a treat!

We’re dressin’ up
We play the beat

To move your feet
Come on and dance with the Halloween band

So sing it loud
and clap your hands

We’re a happy, happy Halloween band
Now come and join the Halloween band
All you gotta do is slide, slide (slide, slide)
Jump, jump (jump, jump )
Clap your hands
Now you’re a part of the Halloween band!

Let’s walk the neighbourhood
Knocking on doors, singing “trick or treat”

We’ll take the party to the street
Get your costumes on
Everyone come and join the band
What band?
The Halloween band!
I’m a witch…I play the broom guitar
I play the bass….bluh!
I’m a superstar
Superman laying down a super, duper beat
Now with all of you the band’s complete!

We’re dressin’ up
We play the beat

To move your feet
Come on and dance with the Halloween band

So sing it loud
And clap your hands
With the Halloween band

We’re dressin’ up,
We play the beat,

To move your feet
Come on and dance with the Halloween band

So sing it loud
And clap your hands

We’re a happy, happy Halloween band
We’re a happy, happy Halloween band

Happy, happy Halloween (Happy, happy Halloween)
Have a happy, happy Halloween (Happy, happy Halloween)
With the happy Halloween band
